column4: I just upgraded my Warty to Hoary and a lot of things don't really work. For starters, how do I play a music CD. I put it in and thought in Warty it launched xmms I think. Now nothing. Can't play a wav file on my music CD??
CD player says drive error - but file viewer can see files there.
I think you can use the PostScript Viewer to view .pdf, not sure
